answers.author: Stefano Tripi
answers.text:
Hi there,
our municipality in Italy is using LimeSurvey for online questionnaires, both for internal evaluation (i.e. for personnel development courses) and for external research (i.e. for statistical research on citizens).
The software is free and open source, the link is: http://www.limesurvey.org/.

author: Yvette Leonard
text:
Hi Christina,
Durham County is considering implementing a similar process for our exit questionnaire.  What survey tool did you use?  Was something developed internally or did you use something else like Survey Monkey?
title: On line exit surveys- Follow-up to Christina's question
